WorkItem.Description:
I'm trying to use the Optimize feature in b5, and it consistently hangs on the "equip the findings" stage. Optimization itself completes OK, but I can't see it's results :) This happens regardless of whether I select Override reenchant/regem and regardless of the thoroughness I set.
Â 
I'm using WinXP Home. Please let me know how can I provide more information for you to be able to understand the problem.

Comments.Message: Please attach the character file that this happens with.
I do optimization fine, it shows the dialog asking if you want to equip, I click yes and it equips it. What exactly is not working for you? Does it crash for you? What is the error you get?

I get the dialog, I click yes and the system just hangs, Rawr fully loading the CPU (well, one of its cores). I left it this way overnight, it used up 8 hours of processing time and still didn't complete, so it obviously isn't just "give it some time to think". :)

Anyway, I re-created my profile from scratch in this build of a program (the one I attached was inherited from 2.1.9), and the optimize->equip routine completes just fine now. So given the fact that I have no error message for you and you can't reproduce the problem on your end, I guess this issue is a dead end - feel free to close :) The only inference to make is that for some reason "inherited" profile might not work sometimes.
